tool_description: This API provides Covid-19 statistics by year, month, day, and the most recent day in Trinidad and Tobago.

api_list.name: getMostRecentDay
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches the most recent Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics. It returns data for that specific day alone.

api_list.name: getStatsbyDay
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by day. The months should be input as '01' or '12' and the days in a similar format as '01' to '31'.

required_parameters.name: yearId
required_parameters.description: The year for which statistics are requested.

required_parameters.name: monthId
required_parameters.description: The month for which statistics are requested.

required_parameters.name: dayId
required_parameters.description: The day for which statistics are requested.

api_list.name: getStatsbyYear
api_list.description: This endpoint delivers Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by year. The beginning year is 2020 and the latest year is the current year.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The year for which statistics are requested.

api_list.name: getStatsbyMonth
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by month. The months should be input as '01' or '12'.

required_parameters.name: yearId
required_parameters.description: The year for which statistics are requested.

required_parameters.name: monthId
required_parameters.description: The month for which statistics are requested.
